overview: Shoji Tabuchi, his wife, and vivacious emcee, Dorothy Tabuchi, welcome audiences to their brand new theatre in Branson, Missouri with a show that truly has something for everyone! Shoji and Dorothy Tabuchi, and their daughter Christina, are excited to share their love of country music, bluegrass, Cajun, jazz, western swing, and even a bit of Broadway with Branson audiences.
title: Shoji Tabuchi "Fiddlin' Around" (Volume I)
